channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi -- EH-VIEW
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi -- EH-VIEW

item.title: CVE-2023-39985|2023-08-23T01:33:33.691Z -- hitachi -- eh-view
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability in Hitachi EH-VIEW (Designer) allows local attackers to potentially execute arbitray code on affected EH-VIEW installations. User interaction is required to exploit the vulnerabilities in that the user must open a malicious file. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by the maintainer.

item.title: CVE-2023-39984|2024-06-05T20:37:46.622Z -- hitachi -- eh-view
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer vulnerability in Hitachi EH-VIEW (KeypadDesigner) allows local attackers to potentially disclose information and execute arbitray code on affected EH-VIEW installations. User interaction is required to exploit the vulnerabilities in that the user must open a malicious file. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by the maintainer.

item.title: CVE-2023-39986|2023-08-23T01:34:02.528Z -- hitachi -- eh-view
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability in Hitachi EH-VIEW (Designer) allows local attackers to potentially disclose information on affected EH-VIEW installations. User interaction is required to exploit the vulnerabilities in that the user must open a malicious file. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by the maintainer.

item.title: CVE-2023-3495|2023-08-23T01:32:12.229Z -- hitachi -- eh-view
item.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability in Hitachi EH-VIEW (KeypadDesigner) allows local attackers to potentially execute arbitray code on affected EH-VIEW installations. User interaction is required to exploit the vulnerabilities in that the user must open a malicious file. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by the maintainer.
